channel.title: Maccy
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description:
This is the first release in 1.x version branch. Please note, that older versions of Maccy (0.x) will not work correctly after the upgrade. Read more at https://github.com/p0deje/Maccy/discussions/790. ⚠️

  • Enabled persistent history tracking in storage. This forces read-only mode in Maccy 0.x.
  • Added Czech translation.
  • Added Portuguese (Brazil) translation.
  • Improved German and Spanish translations.
  • Fixed the "Get Item from Clipboard History" action not working for selected items.
  • Fixed the "Clear Clipboard History" action.
